trans-unit.source: Cryptographic Service Provider containing the private key container. Requires /k or /km.
trans-unit.target: Cryptographic Service Provider containing the private key container. Requires /k or /km.

trans-unit.source: PFX, P7B, or CER file containing a certificate and private key (if applicable).
trans-unit.target: PFX, P7B, or CER file containing a certificate and private key (if applicable).
trans-unit.note: PFX, P7b, and CER are filetypes.

trans-unit.source: Password for certificate file if required.
trans-unit.target: Password for certificate file if required.

trans-unit.source: Private key container in the user store.
trans-unit.target: Private key container in the user store.

trans-unit.source: Private key container in the machine store.
trans-unit.target: Private key container in the machine store.

trans-unit.source: Cryptographic Service Provider missing while using /csp.
trans-unit.target: Cryptographic Service Provider missing while using /csp.

trans-unit.source: Private key container missing while using /csp. Use /k to provide a key container.
trans-unit.target: Private key container missing while using /csp. Use /k to provide a key container.

trans-unit.source: SHA-1 thumbprint used to access a certificate from a certificate store.
trans-unit.target: SHA-1 thumbprint used to access a certificate from a certificate store.
